subject: Git
question: What are the 3 local file states manged by git?
answer:
Working directory: Folder on your computer that holds all project files.
Staging area: (Git Index) It is the holding area for queueing up changes for the next commit.
Repository: (Commit history) Manages all the final changes and permanently part of the git repository.
